title: help me pls !
body:
hi i am lol player
i just have a lol probleme in launcher when i want to enter lol i get the lol image in the middle  of screen and it dont open$

can u help me pls ! 

and sry for the bad english

replies.body:
If the League of Legends symbol appears, but then nothing happens, it is possible that there is a problem with the patcher itself.  Make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434).  The steps there are the most common solutions that should get you into the client normally.

Feel free to reply back and let me know if it doesn't seem to help!
